title: What are the job opportunities after completing a course in BASLP? - Quora
tags: Bachelors in Audiology and Speech Language Pathology

response.answer_text: One can work in hospital set ups, hearing aid industries, special schools, speech and hearing institutes, private nursing homes, prevention of deafness programs or do private practice. However, most of the time, potential employers ask for graduates with MASLP or M.Sc (Aud) or M.Sc (SLP) rather than BASLP.
